com.acmetelecom

Class HtmlBillPrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acmetelecom.HtmlBillPrinter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBillPrinter

    public class HtmlBillPrinter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBillPrinter
    Responsible for printing parts of a bill in HTML form.

        pricePlan - The customer's price plan/tariff.

        public void printItem(java.lang.String time,

             java.lang.String duration,
             java.lang.String cost)
        Prints the specified call information as a HTML table entry.
        Specified by:
        printItem in interface IBillPrinter
        Parameters:
        time - The start time of the call.
        callee - The receiver's phone number.
        duration - The call duration.
        cost - The call cost.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any of arguments are null.
